description.zh-cn: 中国白族作家、文艺理论家，曾任云南大学中文系系主任。
description.en: A Chinese writer and literary theorist of Bai ethnicity, formerly the head of the Department of Chinese at Yunnan University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省下辖的县，是张文勋的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zhang Wenxun.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国云南省的综合性大学，张文勋的母校及其任教地。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Yunnan Province, China, where Zhang Wenxun studied and later taught.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1949年前的外围组织。
description.en: A peripheral organization of the Communist Party of China before 1949.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的综合性大学，张文勋曾在此进修。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Beijing, China, where Zhang Wenxun pursued advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 云南大学下属的教学单位，张文勋曾担任该系系主任。
description.en: An academic department within Yunnan University, where Zhang Wenxun served as its head.

nodes.id: 中国作家协会云南分会

zh-cn: 中国作家协会云南分会

description.zh-cn: 中国作家协会在云南省的分支机构。
description.en: The Yunnan provincial branch of the Chinese Writers Association.

nodes.id: 中国古代文学理论学会

zh-cn: 中国古代文学理论学会

description.zh-cn: 中国的学术团体，张文勋曾任常务理事。
description.en: A Chinese academic society where Zhang Wenxun served as a standing council member.

description.zh-cn: 一部关于白族文学历史的著作，由张文勋与他人合编。
description.en: A work on the history of Bai literature, co-edited by Zhang Wenxun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性诗词学术团体。
description.en: A national academic society for classical poetry in China.

description.zh-cn: 张文勋是云南洱源人。
description.en: Zhang Wenxun is from Eryuan, Yunnan.

position.en: Student of the Department of Literature and History

description.zh-cn: 1948年考入云南大学文史系，1953年毕业于云南大学中文系。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Literature and History at Yunnan University in 1948 and graduated from the Department of Chinese in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 1949年参加地下党的外围组织“民青”。
description.en: In 1949, joined 'Minqing', a peripheral organization of the underground party.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，张文勋被送到北京大学中文系文艺理论进修斑学习两年，此段非学历性质的学习经历对其学术生涯产生了影响。
description.en: In 1954, Zhang Wenxun was sent to a two-year advanced study class on literary theory at the Department of Chinese, Peking University. This non-degree study experience influenced his academic career.

description.zh-cn: 1956年从北京大学进修结业后，回云南大学任教。
description.en: After completing his advanced studies at Peking University in 1956, he returned to Yunnan University to teach.

description.zh-cn: 张文勋曾任云南大学中文系系主任。
description.en: Zhang Wenxun served as the head of the Department of Chinese at Yunnan University.

description.zh-cn: 云南大学中文系是云南大学的下属院系。
description.en: The Department of Chinese is a subordinate department of Yunnan University.

relationships.target: 中国作家协会云南分会

description.zh-cn: 张文勋曾任中国作家协会云南分会理事。
description.en: Zhang Wenxun served as a council member of the Yunnan Branch of the Chinese Writers Association.

relationships.target: 中国古代文学理论学会

description.zh-cn: 张文勋曾任中国古代文学理论学会常务理事。
description.en: Zhang Wenxun served as a standing council member of the China Society for Ancient Literary Theory.

description.zh-cn: 张文勋与他人合编了《白族文学史》。
description.en: Zhang Wenxun co-edited the 'History of Bai Literature'.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，张文勋是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to page category information, Zhang Wenxun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，张文勋是中国作家协会会员。
description.en: According to page category information, Zhang Wenxun is a member of the Chinese Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，张文勋是中华诗词学会顾问。
description.en: According to page category information, Zhang Wenxun is a consultant for the China Poetry Society.
